Posts.Content: Oct 31, 2008 06:01PM Pam777 wrote: I had the exact thing happen to me and had a biopsy which was really easy.  They have you lay on a table and someone even massaged my back, then they have an opening on the table you are laying on, they numb the area and you don't even feel it and it is done under you.  Weird but that is how mine was done.  The results came out negative for cancer or DCIS.  But they want me to come back 6 months later. Which is now and I don't know if they want to do the whole procedure again??? Anyone know???? Don't worry alot of people have this done and it is negative.  God Bless/In Christ  Pam Holloway  I will keep you in my prayers
